data.text: @ThePerezHilton People are stupid and evil. Photo is lovely
@fille_ne @ThePerezHilton Yes!
@ThePerezHilton It’s a vacation pic! Get over it, people! You can appreciate culture without trying to steal it or degrade it. They look so beautiful! #KhloeKardashian
@gfmete @ThePerezHilton its not a race.. it's karate! It's part of his class

@ThePerezHilton IT'S ONE THING TO PAINT YOUR FACE BLACK AND DRESS UP AS THEM ON HALLOWEEN BECAUSE IT'S FUNNY. It's another to be all look how cute we are in this ONE single item sold to us on vacation
@ThePerezHilton What? No more hitting the pipe P. 😃
@ThePerezHilton What’s wrong with people !!! They look gorgeous !!!

@ThePerezHilton People are so judgmental on Instagram but I guess when it’s their turn to be judged  in real life isn’t so easy for them....we r in 2018 and u can’t do/wear/say whatever u want without being commented or judged...the most common word on internet is “cultural appropriation”

@MsSouthernLotus @PerezHilton @ThePerezHilton Right what's the point of going if ppl hate ur for experiencing the culture..
Ppl have nothing better to do than bring down others
@ThePerezHilton ❤️
@MsSouthernLotus @PerezHilton @ThePerezHilton Totally.
@WhatsAnAlex @PerezHilton @ThePerezHilton Thank you! Had a human moment. Lol.
@OneBuke @ThePerezHilton Lol l noticed that now..thanks for correcting me.
@MarOrtiz xoxo
@ThePerezHilton It’s just a cute picture of her and her daughter. I hate how the internet has made people so judgemental. Everyone is Siskel & Ebert but on another level!

@MsSouthernLotus @ThePerezHilton It's Wear sis 
So lets just not wear it now
@MsSouthernLotus @PerezHilton @ThePerezHilton Wear *
@ThePerezHilton It’s a souvenir people get over it

@ThePerezHilton I don’t see anything wrong with it . People from all over the world go to Mexico for spring break and wear the the hat and the poncho ? What’s the difference. Please stop with these nonsense . There’s nothing wrong with what @khloekardashian did. Stop it already.

@ThePerezHilton Wait. How is it why he got elected though? 
Not arguing. Just trying to understand. :)
@ThePerezHilton Ohhh go away people. Must be the uneducated ones that have never traveled that has a problem with this.
@BriBri_BBC @ThePerezHilton Maybe we should stop eating Chinese food, while we're at it?

@ThePerezHilton Love the picture xx 
Can’t people just let people do what they want instead of being accused of things pathetic x
@ThePerezHilton You can’t even wear a hat without someone’s anal glands cramping up nowadays. 🙄🙄🙄🙄
@ThePerezHilton Is anyone surprised? #kardashiantrash #trashwithmoney 😝
@ThePerezHilton So we can't celebrate the culture of other people? We can't go to another country, purchase something, and not where it when we get home. We are so bored!
@ThePerezHilton Oh geez. Come on now. This picture is nothing to get upset about. 🤦‍♀️
@ThePerezHilton This is an adorable picture! People need to quit dissecting everything everyone does.
@ThePerezHilton All I see is a happy mum and a very happy baby
@ThePerezHilton 🙄🙄🙄dear lord people they were in Bali. It’s JUST a picture and a beautiful one at that. Be Happy they are Happy that’s all that matters.

@ThePerezHilton why cant other races enjoy things from other cultures? they aren't making fun of the culture. I feel like people are looking for a reason to bitch and put someone on blast and they are using this cultural thing a reason.
@ThePerezHilton Ugh I hate peoples.

@ThePerezHilton I really don't see the problem, and think it's stupid! I think we should embrace all cultures. And for me, this is one way of doing it. She's sharing that pic cause it's cute! Not to offend anyone. Wonder why there's war in this world?!..
@ThePerezHilton Now she just looks thirsty. Get this negative press and look stupid in the process.

@ThePerezHilton Come on people get a life can we not now wear a hat without being accused of being this or that. It's a sad day when you have to think am I going to upset people if I post a gorgeous picture of my kid wearing a hat.
@ThePerezHilton There are much more pressing things in the world today than to worry about what The Kardhasians do or don't do.
@ThePerezHilton People will literally get mad if you cough the wrong way 🤦🏽‍♀️ She has the happiest baby 💕

@ThePerezHilton Omg ridiculous. They probably sell those hats to tourists everywhere! People are so sensitive. I have a Chinese granddaughter. My 86 year old Dad bought her a mandarin outfit. (She’s Cantonese) my daughter in-law thanked him, and will take pics of her in it, it is very cute Chill
@ThePerezHilton Well is this considered "Cultural Appropriation?" https://t.co/EkyAOfQv4H

@ThePerezHilton This is ridiculous! You are in another country, you are going to try on their cultural attire if u can. Isn't that why people travel... to learn and appreciate other cultures. I'm just flabbergasted people are offended by this 🙄

@ThePerezHilton I see this picture as cultural appreciation☺️💕

Go #KhloeKardashian go! 👏🏽
@ThePerezHilton I’m not too bothered by this one, tbh🤷🏾‍♀️
@ThePerezHilton Who doesn’t wear some form of attire native to the culture they visit?  FFS people need to get over being so stinking sensitive over every damn thing!  I think they look adorable!
@ThePerezHilton Well people upset with that photo are mostly liberals/democratic
